actions.committee: House Committee on Education and the Workforce
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and the Workforce.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Education and the Workforce
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on 21st Century Competitiveness.

official_title: To eliminate the termination date on authority for schools with low default rates to make single disbursements of student loans.

summary.text: Amends the Higher Education Amendments of 1998 to eliminate a termination date for certain provisions, and thus continue to authorize schools with low default rates to make single disbursements of student loans.

titles.title: To eliminate the termination date on authority for schools with low default rates to make single disbursements of student loans.
